name: Kuina
text: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with an original cost of 4 or less. Then, attach up to 3 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your [Roronoa Zoro] Leaders.

effect.text: You may rest this Character: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with an original cost of 4 or less. Then, attach up to 3 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your [Roronoa Zoro] Leaders.
